original: Hetuṁ maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
Hetuṁ maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)
Hetuṁ maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
